snippet: A series at the Agnes Varis Performing Arts Center that encourages experimentation by midcareer artists yields a dance work that examines movement and the space in which it occurs.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Anna Sperber dance piece Ruptured Horizons at Gibney Dance: Agnes Varis Performing Arts Center as part of its Making Space series.
lead_paragraph: A series at the Agnes Varis Performing Arts Center that encourages experimentation by midcareer artists yields a dance work that examines movement and the space in which it occurs.

headline.main: Review: Anna Sperber Plays With Light, Movement and Architecture in ‘Ruptured Horizon’
headline.print_headline: Experimenting With Light and Movement to Transform a Landscape
